definition: to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The soldiers began to search the houses round about, and to pursue the fugitives .
sentences.chinese: 士兵们开始搜查四周的房屋并追捕逃亡者。

sentences.english: Perhaps you can explain why the Dustmen want me dead.
sentences.chinese: 也许你能解释死亡者想要杀死我的原因。

sentences.english: The fugitives could not have taken this as an encouraging sign.
sentences.chinese: 这些逃亡者并没有被看作是鼓舞士气的事件。

sentences.english: Those initially treated operatively, or who died before follow-up were excluded.
sentences.chinese: 除外接受手术治疗者和随访期内死亡者。

sentences.english: The casuingties said Lord Saville were the victims of unjustified firing by the soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 伤亡者是由士兵无情扫射的受害者。

sentences.english: Four health care workers are among the fatalities.
sentences.chinese: 死亡者中包括四名保健工作者。

sentences.english: The fugitive is believed to be headed for the Canadian border.
sentences.chinese: 据信，逃亡者正向加拿大边界方向逃窜。

sentences.english: My Powa service is voluntary and free of any charges.
sentences.chinese: 我为亡者修颇瓦法纯属自愿和免费服务。

sentences.english: Money pay to the family of someone who dies in an accident at work.
sentences.chinese: 向因工伤事故死亡者家庭所付的钱。

sentences.english: Mr Thein Sein has also appealed to exiled dissidents to come home.
sentences.chinese: 登盛先生也呼吁持不同政见的流亡者返回家园。

sentences.english: The police scoured the country for the fugitive.
sentences.chinese: 公安机关在全国搜索逃亡者。

sentences.english: The fugitives travelled by night andrested by day .
The police said no foreigners had been found among the dead and injured so far.
sentences.chinese: 警方称，伤亡者中并无外国人。

sentences.english: Women mourn and gaze up at the entrance of the damaged building.
sentences.chinese: 两位女士凝视着被大火焚毁大楼的入口处悼念亡者。

sentences.english: China is holding a national day of mourning for victims of the powerful earthquake in Qinghai province.
sentences.chinese: 中国为青海玉树地震伤亡者举行全国哀悼日。

definition: god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
spirit of a martyr/spirit of the brave departed/person of remarkable talent
to rest/to go to sleep/to rest in peace/(history) Parthia
to be reborn/to live in paradise (Buddhism)/to die/(after) one's death
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
